edu.mines.jtk.dsp
Interface LocalCausalFilter.A3

Enclosing class:
LocalCausalFilter
public static interface LocalCausalFilter.A3

Interface for filter coefficients indexed in 3 dimensions. Filter coefficients may vary with sample indices, and will be got through this interface for every output sample computed.

Method Summary
 void get(int i1, int i2, int i3, float[] a)
          Gets local filter coefficients for the specified sample.
 

Method Detail

get

void get(int i1,
         int i2,
         int i3,
         float[] a)
Gets local filter coefficients for the specified sample.

Parameters:
i1 - sample index in 1st dimension.
i2 - sample index in 2nd dimension.
i3 - sample index in 3rd dimension.
a - array to be filled with coefficients.
